description: Whether you’re crushing the work day or on an epic vacation, the Trembly Vest for men is ready and waiting to back you up. This heavyweight style is made with 40g of Polartec® High Loft™ insulation, so you have the perfect amount of warmth as you move. Also with added interior quilting, creating a core of comfort. This style is made to travel. Inside you’ll find a passport compatible zip pocket, keeping it safe and secure. While on the outside, there are convenient storage spots like a zip chest pocket and dual entry hand pockets.
name: Prana Trembly Vest - Mens
